title: 1.8客户端怎么用
author: asd765898337
txt_content:
本帖最后由 asd765898337 于 2011-9-11 14:27 编辑 

我用1.8客户端做了一个服务器，但只得自己进去玩，而且别人不能玩...后来不知道跳了什么东西，我自己也不能玩了，有没有办法不用什么联网工具就可以来我家IP地址玩啊？怎么调正常的1.8服务器呢？
求解！！！！
出现了这个...

2011-09-11 14:09:40 [INFO] Starting minecraft server version Beta 1.8 Pre-release 2011-09-11 14:09:40][信息minecraftβ1.8版本开始正式服务器2011-09-11 14:09:40 [WARNING] **** NOT ENOUGH RAM! 2011-09-11 14:09:40[警告]* * * *没有足够的内存!2011-09-11 14:09:40 [WARNING] To start the server with more ram, launch it as "java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar" 2011-09-11 14:09:40[警告]启动服务器与更多的内存,这是“爪哇-Xmx1024M发射-Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar”2011-09-11 14:09:40 [INFO] Loading properties 2011-09-11 14:09:40][信息加载性能2011-09-11 14:09:40 [WARNING] server.properties does not exist 2011-09-11 14:09:40[警告]server.properties不存在2011-09-11 14:09:40 [INFO] Generating new properties file 2011-09-11 14:09:40][信息生成新的属性文件2011-09-11 14:09:40 [INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565 2011-09-11 14:09:40][信息开始Minecraft服务器上*:25565 -2011-09-11 14:09:40 [WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT! 2011-09-11 14:09:40[警告]* * * *没有绑定到港口!2011-09-11 14:09:40 [WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind 2011-09-11 14:09:40[警告]的例外是:java.net.BindException:地址:JVM_Bind已在使用2011-09-11 14:09:40 [WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port? 2011-09-11 14:09:40[警告]或许已经运行在服务器端口吗?怎么解决？一打服务器命令就出现Unexpected exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
 at pb.a(SourceFile:61)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.b(SourceFile:397)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(SourceFile:311)
 at ce.run(SourceFile:418)

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 我看见了not enough ram 看来你电脑不行啊 换个好点的机子

replies.author: asd765898337
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-11 14:47 
我看见了not enough ram 看来你电脑不行啊 换个好点的机子
not enough ram ?什么意思？额....我不可能换了....

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 没有足够的ram 就是内存

replies.author: asd765898337
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-11 15:30 
没有足够的ram 就是内存
都2G了还不够？

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 2G那是最低要求 玩mc要16G才会很爽 8G酬和这吧 我这里2G也很卡

replies.author: asd765898337
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-11 15:59 
2G那是最低要求 玩mc要16G才会很爽 8G酬和这吧 我这里2G也很卡
不不不不不不会吧！！！现在MC怎么小就要吭2G了？？？！！！！

replies.author: asd765898337
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-11 16:14 
2G本来就不多啊
55555555哪新增电脑的内存最大能放几G呢？

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 弄个16G或者更大的台机吧

replies.author: asd765898337
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-11 17:16 
弄个16G或者更大的台机吧
大哥，我没钱...

replies.author: asd765898337
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-11 18:04 
那就只能不开咯
开始mofs的法师家的内存也和我一样，为什么他就可以？还可以开1.8的！！！还能让我们来玩~

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 说不定他电脑好啊 我又不是他我怎么知道
